sentences.english: Hero of the story is the Duke Guan.
sentences.chinese: 故事的主人公是齊桓公管仲。

sentences.english: In the Spring and Autumn Period, Duke Huan of Qi led an army to attack a small state in the north.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時代，齊桓公出徵攻打北方一個小國。
